title: Fact Check Team: Natural immunity vs. vaccine immunity
author: JANAE BOWENS; JOHN SEWARD; The National Desk
description: WASHINGTON (TND) — As holiday gatherings are happening, many people — vaccinated, unvaccinated and those who have already had COVID — are wondering just how safe they are from getting the virus. There is a difference between natural immunity and vaccine immunity and The National Desk's Fact Check Team is looking into exactly what those differences are.
